48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn `Abbas narrated from Ubayy bin Ka`b that :whenever the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would mention someone and supplicate for him, he would begin with himself (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الدَّاعِيَ يَبْدَأُ بِنَفْسِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The One Supplicating Should Begin With Himself
